recipe.name: Rhubarb and Custard
recipe.preparation: Mix together and put in oven proof dish
recipe.cooking: Heat in a moderate oven for 40 mins

recipe.name: Basic poached eggs
recipe.preparation: Serve poached eggs with toasted brioche, Turkish or sourdough bread. Or try poached eggs on top of toasted English muffins, with basil pesto and sliced leg ham.
recipe.cooking: Serve eggs on toast, sprinkled with chives and seasoned to taste with salt and pepper, or use in one of the recipes on the following pages.

recipe.name: Little devils
recipe.preparation: Using a teaspoon, scoop yolks into a bowl. Using a fork, lightly mash.
recipe.cooking: To ensure centred yolks in hard-boiled eggs, gently stir eggs constantly while cooking.
